With over 10,000 members in the first several months of launching, the United American Committee grows across the U.S. at an unprecedented rate. The organization focuses on promoting awareness of threats which face America from within the U.S. borders, primarily focusing on Islamic Extremism within America. With local chapters launching across the U.S., this is far more than an organization, it is a massive political movement. Their website is www.UnitedAmericanCommittee.org
 The monitoring of Islamic Extremism within America, something which all too many have ignored.
